column3: I feel like Superman,, they gon' remember me
column4: I think I know I can,, who says it's hard to reach?
column5: Who's gonna stop me on the road to success?
column9: They tried to break me down,, but I'm still on my feet
column10: This city's full of life,, so why is it hard to breathe?
column11: Oh,, why did God create this world so unfair?
column15: Sometimes I feel like I can't run,, I can't crawl
column16: And sometimes I feel like I ain't nothing at all
column17: Life is a journey where you stumble and fall
column18: But I'm okay when I lie down in your arms
column22: When I lie down in your arms
column26: When I lie down in your arms
column29: I feel like moving back,, sometimes it's hard to dream
column30: The life I chose is past,, it's moving without me
column31: Who doesn't want a machine so they can go back in time?
column35: My time went by too fast,, there is no one left but me
column36: I have got a nine to five and it gets the best of me
column37: This is the life I'm gonna live to the end,, but I'm okay
